text:
To Reproduce using the latest from HEAD:

- Start JMeter
- Create a Thread Group
- In the Thread Group, attach a View Results Tree, HTTP Header Manager, and an
HTTP Request
- Define at least one header
- Fill in the appropriate information in the HTTP Request
- Run the Test
- Open the request in the view
- Click the request tab in the view
- Notice that there are duplicate entries for each header listed
creator: cstaylor@nanshu.com

text:
Created attachment 12387
Patch file for fix
creator: cstaylor@nanshu.com

text:
I don't consider this a bug, since it's nice to see the header values set in the
test plan and the headers returned by server. What is the rationale for not
having the both shown? What about cases where someone wants to see both the
header values and the samplerData?

peter
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
